revisions.*:
{{Single source|date=March 2013}}
'''Mississippi Heat''' is an [[United States|American]] [[blues]] [[musical ensemble|band]].<ref name="AMG"/>

The group was formed in 1991 in [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], [[United States]], and was influenced by early [[electric blues]] of the 1950s.<ref name="AMG">{{cite web|last=Ankeny |first=Jason |url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/mississippi-heat-mn0000424020 |title=Mississippi Heat - Music Biography, Credits and Discography |publisher=AllMusic |date= |accessdate=2013-03-15}}</ref> They played locally in Chicago [[nightclub|clubs]], and went through several member changes in the 1990s, all the while recording ten [[album]]s<ref name="AMG"/> and a [[DVD]].

==Members==
;Current
*Pierre Lacocque - harmonica (1991–present)<ref name="AMG"/>
*Inetta Visor (?-present)
*Giles Corey (?-present)
*Steve Howard (?-present)
*Kenny Smith - drums (1997–present)<ref name="AMG"/>

*[[Billy Flynn (musician)|Billy Flynn]] - guitar (1991-2)<ref name="AMG"/>
*James Wheeler - guitar (1991-?)<ref name="AMG"/>
*[[Bob Stroger]] - bass (1991-?)<ref name="AMG"/>
*[[Deitra Farr]] - vocals (1993-1996)<ref>{{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p207251|pure_url=yes}}|title=Biography: Deitra Farr|last=Skelly|first=Richard|publisher=[[Allmusic]]|accessdate=July 13,  2010}}</ref><ref name="AMG"/>
*Allen Kirk - drums (1993-1996)<ref name="AMG"/>
*Mary Lane - vocals (1997)<ref name="AMG"/>
*[[Zora Young]] - vocals (1997)<ref name="AMG"/>
*[[Barrelhouse Chuck]] - piano (1997)<ref name="AMG"/>
*Max Valldeneu (?)
*Chris Hambone Cameron (guest on several CDs)
*[[Carl Weathersby]] (guest on several CDs)
*[[Lurrie Bell]] (guest on last two CDs and DVD)
*[[Calvin "Fuzz" Jones]] - bass (1993)<ref>{{cite web|author= |url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/calvin-quot-fuzz-quot-jones-mn0000945718 |title=Calvin "Fuzz" Jones - Music Biography, Credits and Discography |publisher=AllMusic |date= |accessdate=2013-03-15}}</ref>
*[[Joseph Veloz]] - bass (2011-2012)

==Discography==
*''Straight From the Heart'' (Van der Linden Records, 1993)
*''Learned the Hard Way'' (Van der Linden, 1994)
*''Thunder in My Heart'' (Van der Linden, 1995)
*''Handyman'' (Van der Linden, 1999)
*''Footprints on the Ceiling'' ([[Crosscut Records]], 2002)
*''Glad You're Mine'' (Crosscut, 2005)
*''One Eye Open'' ([[Delmark Records|Delmark]], 2005)
*''Hattiesburg Blues'' (Delmark, 2008)
*''Let's Live it Up!'' (Delmark, 2010)
*''Delta Bound'' (Delmark, 2012)<ref name="AMG"/>
